DOC.brief_summary: The purpose Study determine whether early treatment pravastatin reduce adverse cardiac event patient acute myocardial infarction minimally mildly elevate serum Low Density Lipoprotein -Cholesterol ( LDL-C ) level .
DOC.brief_title: Pravastatin Acute Myocardial Infarction With Minimally Mildly Increased Levels Serum Cholesterol Study
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator previously report beneficial effect early use low-dose pravastatin major adverse cardiac event patient acute myocardial infarction mild moderate hypercholesterolemia OACIS-LIPID Study . The PRACTIC study design OACIS-LIPID II trial determine whether early treatment pravastatin reduce adverse cardiac event patient acute myocardial infarction minimally mildly elevate serum Low Density Lipoprotein -Cholesterol ( LDL-C ) level .
DOC.criteria: 1. presence 2 follow 3 criterion : 1. clinical history central chest oppression , pain , tightness last ≥30 minute 2. typical electrocardiographic change ( i.e. , STsegment elevation > 0.1 mV ≥1 limb 2 precordial lead , STsegment depression > 0.1 mV ≥2 lead , abnormal Q wave , Twave inversion ≥2 lead ) 3. increase serum creatine kinase level > 2 time normal laboratory value . 2. serum level LDLC ≥70 130 > mg/dl first blood examination soon admission 1. concurrent therapy HMGCoA reductase inhibitor 2. previous history side effect associate HMGCoA reductase inhibitor 3. lifethreatening arrhythmia 4. severe chronic congestive heart failure 5. hepatic dysfunction 6. renal failure 7. cerebrovascular disease 8. poor control diabetes 9. pregnancy , lactation 10. age < 20 year 11. disability take medicine absence write informed consent 12 . Patients doctor consider inappropriate reason
